de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.string

Class LevenshteinComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasureBase
      • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
        • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.lexical.string.LevenshteinComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimilarityMeasure, TermSimilarityMeasure, TextSimilarityMeasure

    public class LevenshteinComparator
extends TextSimilarityMeasureBase
    SecondString comparator fails for some texts. Used the implementation from http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Algorithm_Implementation/Strings/Levenshtein_distance#Java

    • Field Summary
